name: Innhotep
overview:
Innhotep is a fast growing consulting company, dedicated to innovation strategy and development, specialised in two sectors : IT and cleantech.

Innhotep works with both start-ups and big corporations.

1) Services to start-ups: Innhotep supports high potential start-ups in their development. Innhotep focuses on accelerating start-up growth by acting as a transition manager on specific functions and competences that are vital to boost the start-up growth potential. The core competences Innhotep provides are: â€¢ strategic and product marketing â€¢ operational marketing â€¢ business development â€¢ networking.

2) Services to big corporations: Innhotep defines itself as an â€œaccelerator of business innovationsâ€, as it enables its clients: â€¢ To strengthen the role of innovation in their strategy and organisation â€¢ To develop and accelerate their growth by identifying for them new business opportunities (through ideas, start-up, new market niches emerging from new services, new technologies, new business models) and by helping them deploy it.
